Public Remarks: Welcome Home! This is the one. Renovated in 2008 to celebrate all of life's moments as well as provide retreat and serenity for its residents, 2533 Marsha is the home that does it all. Through the front door, a grand living and entertaining space with a showcase wall perfect for selfies awaits its guests. Extra high ceilings allow sunlight to flood every inch, creating an open and airy feel. Anchoring this space is a showcase kitchen featuring a gas Viking range, stainless appliances, and a stately-sized porcelain island, perfect for potlucks or homework. French doors seamlessly transition the indoors to the masterfully designed backyard featuring a gas hearth, full outdoor kitchen, and hot tub hookups. Not to be overlooked is the primary bedroom modeled after a luxury resort. It offers its owners a retreat within a retreat. Guest bedrooms flank the right side of the home, a home office, and a proper family or bonus room on the left. All this plus all of the events and amazing neighbors on Marsha Way, this is much more than just a home. Come see for yourself today!

Public Remarks: Recently remodeled 4-bedroom, 3-bathroom ranch home in Willow Glen. This property offers ample room for comfortable living and entertaining. Step inside to discover a thoughtfully designed interior featuring an open kitchen with a large island with seating, custom cabinets, state-of-the-art appliances including a Bertazzoni range, wine fridge, and leathered granite countertops. Next to the kitchen, you'll find a dining area ideal for gatherings. The separate family and living rooms provide versatile spaces. The separate office in the backyard featuring both AC and heat offers a retreat for remote work or study. The primary suite the overlooks the backyard includes a luxurious bathroom with Carrera marble double vanities and a glass shower. Additionally, a junior primary suite with attached bathroom adds convenience and flexibility. The backyard is an entertainer's dream, featuring a saltwater pool and spa, custom built-in outdoor kitchen with counter seating, and multiple outdoor dining and seating areas. This home also includes a laundry room with mud room area, plank french oak floors, owned solar, a tankless water heater, no-salt water softener and so much more. Don't miss the opportunity to make this exceptional property your own and enjoy the ultimate California lifestyle.

Public Remarks: Must See to Believe!!! This gorgeous 6 bedroom, 4.5 bathroom, 3,952 square foot home located in on a fantastic street in the heart of Willow Glen & would be ideal for you and your family. The home was built in 2007 with timeless design. The hardwood flooring adds to the refined beauty of this spacious custom home. The massive gourmet kitchen features top of the line appliances, granite counters, custom cabinets, large island with breakfast bar and sink. Spend a quiet evening at home in front of the beautiful gas fireplace located in the large family room with vaulted ceiling. Convenient indoor laundry with large built-in pantry is a distinct benefit of this home. Other features of this amazing home include a large 4 car detached garage, game/movie room, dual zone heat and AC, builtin wine storage & whole house fan. Outside, stunning mature landscaping matches the homes interior beauty. The large covered patio features gas fireplace and TV perfect for relaxing or dining alfresco.

Public Remarks: The very best street in all of Willow Glen! Locals say people lucky enough to live here never move from this close knit community. Wide, quiet, tree lined streets in a sylvan neighborhood, all within close proximity to major Silicon Valley tech companies. This property has a rare quintessential single level Ranch style home. The spacious house has been fully upgraded (except the kitchen is left for you ) and boasts the quality construction of another era; solid hardwood floors throughout, a full family room with an actual wood-burning fireplace & full living room with another wood-burning fireplace. Vaulted open beam ceilings. Extra large double sliding glass doors off the family room open up a whole wall of glass to give you access to the private fenced backyard for outdoor cooking and entertaining. Most rooms and entry are handicapped accessible. Recessed lighting and double pane windows throughout. Master bedroom with private bath. 2 walk-in closets plus more extra storage. Bay window seating. Enter the separate mud room & laundry from the garage. Large trees lend to the stately quality of this property. Updated landscaping. 2 car garage with room for your workshop. Room to create RV or boat parking. This property truly feels like a forever home.
Showing Instruction: Go Directly,Lockbox - Supra iBox Bluetooth LE

Public Remarks: Gorgeous custom home in a fantastic Willow Glen neighborhood! Built in 2008 and like new, this 3,150 sqft home features 4 bedrooms & 3.5 bathrooms on a spacious 9,148 sqft lot. High ceilings with abundant natural light. Open floorplan downstairs joins dining room, family room with fireplace, wet bar & gourmet kitchen featuring custom cabinetry, granite counters, island w/seating, & stainless GE appliances. Entertainers dream! Downstairs has 2 bedrooms, full bath with double vanity, & enormous ensuite bedroom with full bath & living area. Plumbed for a kitchenette, could easily convert to an ADU. Laundry room, half bath, & access to 3-car garage on 1st floor. Upstairs huge 2nd primary suite with tray ceilings is a perfect retreat with huge walk-in closet plumbed for 2nd laundry and luxurious bath with sunken tub, marble surround, double vanity, separate toilet area with 3rd sink. Hardwood floors, 2-zone heat & A/C, all new lighting, interior & exterior paint. Large backyard with space for pool or ADU. Tons of standup attic storage. Walk to Schallenberger, shops, restaurants & much more! A must see home. Open House: Saturday & Sunday (4/27 & 4/28) from 1 - 4:30pm

Public Remarks: Situated on a massive corner lot encompassed by lush lawns, this lovely residence aligns sophisticated design with casual California living. Admire the incredible curb appeal before making your way towards the entry. The front doors sidelights brighten the foyer as you enter the sun-drenched living room that boasts a fireplace & connects gracefully to the rest of the home. The adjacent kitchen provides ample cabinetry, stainless steel appliances, & a breakfast nook ideal for serving quick bites. Gather with loved ones in the bright sunroom, & slide glass doors open to a spacious stone-lined patio & large wrap-around lawn perfect for al-fresco dining. A hall guides you to 2BRs & a primary suite that accompanies a full hall bath. A half bath, attached garage, & dedicated laundry area further complete this flowing floor plan. Desirably located in a friendly San Jose neighborhood, relish in proximity to parks, excellent schools, shopping centers, & nearby highways for easy travel.

Welcome home to 2584 Lansford, in the heart of Southern Willow Glen! This traditional, ranch-style home has been beautifully upgraded with features that will truly impress. As you look from the road, you will notice that the stunning curb appeal is matched by the beauty of the unique, tree-lined street. The homes outline sets the tone for the elegance and charm that await inside. As you enter, you'll gaze through the floor to ceiling windows into the landscaped backyard, where lush greenery and vibrant blooms create a park-like setting. The inside of the home has updated bathrooms as well as a remodeled kitchen with high-end appliances. Hardwood floors flow throughout, exuding warmth and sophistication. Built-in entertainment system, complete with wall and ceiling speakers, allowing you to immerse yourself in your favorite music or movies anywhere in the house. The entire home has also been freshly painted. Don't miss this opportunity to make this charming Willow Glen Ranch home yours.

Confidential Remarks: Solar owned. Hot tub pump not working but will be fixed. Stained glass in backyard not included. Brand New AC units added. Contact Adam with questions.
Public Remarks: Beautifully maintained 5 Bedroom and 3 Full Bathroom home located in the desirable neighborhood of Willow Glen. Mature landscaping in the front and backyard with a massive magnolia tree and attached swing that shares decades of stories. Newly refinished hardwood floors spanning through the whole ground floor with 3 downstairs bedrooms. Primary bedroom upstairs with ensuite bathroom and walk-in closet. The second upstairs bedroom flows into a convenient loft to relax and get away from it all! New air conditioning units upstairs and downstairs. Tons of room and options for anyone looking to get onto a great street with that Willow Glen Lifestyle that people rave about. Located in the heart of San Jose, offering convenient access to a wealth of amenities. Enjoy nearby parks, shopping centers, restaurants, and entertainment options. Easy access to major highways and public transportation. You can enjoy the fun things that WG has to offer.

Public Remarks: Unique opportunity to buy and build your dream home with Thomas James Homes in beautiful Willow Glen. Enter through the covered porch to the open floor concept plan where family & friends can gather in the expansive great room with a fireplace, and sliding doors to the patio, or enjoy a nice meal in the dining area. The chef inspired kitchen includes a spacious island with bar seating, stainless steel appliances, 6-burner induction range, and walk-in pantry. The first floor comes complete with 2 bedrooms, one primary with an en suite bath, a secondary bedroom, and a guest half bath. Ascend the stairs to a bright and airy loft, 2 secondary bedrooms, and a laundry room with sink & storage. The grand suite features an impressive walk-in closet and luxurious grand bath with a freestanding soaking tub, walk-in shower, and dual sink vanity. Estimated home completion is Winter 2023. *Illustrative landscaping shown is generic and does not represent the landscaping proposed for this site.

Living room seamlessly flows into the dining area perfect for entertaining.Kitchen has been beautifully remodeled with modern appliances, granite countertops, ample storage, large island, breakfast bar. Off the kitchen is additional nice size family room with a second fireplace and sliding glass doors that lead to the private backyard. The primary bedroom is generously sized and features an en-suite bathroom that has been fully updated with high-end fixtures and finishes. The 8840 sf corner lot provides an oasis backyard ample room for a large patio area.There's also an attached garage with plenty of space for storage and parking.Located in the highly sought-after South Willow Glen neighborhood.

Public Remarks: Welcome to this stunning and tastefully remodeled home located in the sought-after neighborhood of Willow Glen. This home features a bright open floor plan with an abundance of natural light. The step down room off of the dining room would be ideal as a den, family room or possibly a fourth bedroom. Preparing meals in the large open kitchen will surely be a delight. The kitchen features white custom cabinets with soft close, quartz countertops, wolf range and stainless steel appliances. Custom built closet organizers, copper plumbing, new electrical, water filtration system and so much more. This is an absolute must see! Enjoy the beauty of the backyard while sitting around the firepit. Close to all the amenities downtown Willow Glen has to offer. This is a special place to call home.
